mapper.select: SELECT file_name, file_size, md5, update_time, version FROM client_file ORDER BY version DESC
SELECT * FROM client_file t1, ( SELECT MAX(VERSION) AS lastest_version FROM client_file) t2 WHERE t1.version = t2.lastest_version
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO client_file (file_name, file_size, md5, version) VALUES (#{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{md5}, #{version})
mapper.update: UPDATE client_file SET file_name = #{fileName}, file_size = #{fileSize}, md5 = #{md5}, update_time = now()
